trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 패널을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control of previous versions, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> 대체 하 고 여기에 새로운 기능이 추가 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> 이전 버전의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> 선택 하는 경우 이전 버전과 호환성을 유지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel represents an individual panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarPanel 각 패널을 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarPanel 텍스트 및/또는 응용 프로그램의 상태를 반영 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 아이콘을 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>통해 액세스할 수 있는는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>검색, 추가 또는 개별 StatusBarPanel 제거를 제어 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The StatusBarPanel provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 패널의 표시 동작을 수정할 수 있도록 하는 속성을 제공 하는 StatusBarPanel는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property to display an icon within a panel.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>속성 패널에 아이콘을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 응용 프로그램의 상태를 그래픽으로 표현 데 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>속성을 사용 하면 패널 내에서 텍스트 및/또는 아이콘 정렬 되는 방법을 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 을 보장 하기 위해 패널 패널의 텍스트에 맞게 제대로 크기가 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>속성을 자동으로 조정 하는 패널의 텍스트에 맞게 또는 나머지 채울 패널 내에서 공간에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>속성을 사용 하면 데이터를 표시 하는 것 보다 더 작은 확보 하지 못하는 되도록 패널에 대 한 최소 너비를 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>컨트롤은 일반적으로 도움말 정보 또는 응용 프로그램에 대 한 상태 정보를 표시 하는 데 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel.
trans-unit.target: 것이 패널에 표시 되는 데이터에 대 한 추가 정보를 표시 하는 것이 중요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>속성을 마우스 포인터를 패널에 놓을 때마다 정보를 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>컨트롤은 일반적으로 텍스트 정보를 표시 하는 데 사용 됩니다는 StatusBarPanel에 직접 표시 유형을 제공할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property enables you to specify how the StatusBarPanel will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>속성을 사용 하면는 StatusBarPanel 그리는 방법 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is used to display the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> property (and an icon, if specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>속성의 값을 표시 하는을 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>속성 (및 아이콘에 지정 된 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>속성).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, you can draw your own information into the panel.
trans-unit.target: 속성이로 설정 된 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, 사용자의 정보 패널에 그릴 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel.
trans-unit.target: 진행률 표시줄 또는 애니메이션된 아이콘 패널에 그릴이 기능을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the StatusBarPanel class, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarPanel 클래스의 인스턴스를 만들 때 읽기/쓰기 속성은 초기 값으로 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 값의 목록에 대 한 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 만들 때 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, 다음 읽기/쓰기 속성은 초기 값으로 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|10| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|100| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 초기 값 | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|&10; | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>| 길이가&0; 인 문자열입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>| 길이가&0; 인 문자열입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|&100; | 속성에 대 한 별도 호출을 통해 이러한 속성에 대 한 값을 변경할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 상태 표시줄 패널 내에 아이콘 및 텍스트의 맞춤을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property within the borders of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하 여 가로 텍스트 맞춤 및/또는 아이콘에 할당 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>속성 패널의 테두리 내.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 및 아이콘을 왼쪽, 오른쪽, 가운데 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 정렬할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 내에서 아이콘을 독립적으로 위치를 지정할 방법이 있으면

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side.
trans-unit.target: 아이콘의 왼쪽을 배치할 수 없습니다는 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>텍스트 오른쪽에 정렬 하는 동안.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: 아이콘은 항상 텍스트를 맞추는 방법을 상관 없이 텍스트의 왼쪽에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 속성에 할당 된 값의 구성원이 아닙니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> 열거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: 상태 표시줄 패널은 자동으로 조정 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> have precedence over those panels set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>로 설정 된 개체 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>패널로 설정 보다 우선 순위가 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that has its AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> is shortened if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> with the AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> requires that space.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>의 AutoSize 속성이로 설정 되어 있는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>경우 줄어듭니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>AutoSize 속성이로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>해당 공간을 필요로 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use AutoSize to ensure that the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> are properly displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that contains more than one panel.
trans-unit.target: 자동 크기 조정의 내용을 확인 하는 데 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>제대로 표시는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>여러 패널에 포함 된 컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), while another panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 자동으로 표시 된 대로 텍스트의 크기를 조정 하는 텍스트를 포함 하는 패널을 할 수 있습니다 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>)의 다른 패널 반면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>소유자가 그린 진행률 표시줄이 고정된 크기 될 필요가 표시 하 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 속성에 할당 된 값의 구성원이 아닙니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref> 열거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 초기화를 시작는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 폼에 사용 되거나 다른 구성 요소에서 사용 하는 구성 요소 초기화를 시작에 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>메서드 초기화를 끝냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: BeginInit를 사용 하 여 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>메서드는 컨트롤이 완전히 초기화 되기 전에 사용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 상태 표시줄 패널의 테두리 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to differentiate a panel from other panels in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 패널에 다른 패널 구별 하기 위해이 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 속성에 할당 된 값의 구성원이 아닙니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref> 열거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> 관리 되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 public `Dispose()` 메서드 및 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`보호 된 호출 `Dispose(Boolean)` 메서드는 `disposing` 매개 변수 설정 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>호출 `Dispose` 와 `disposing` 로 설정 `false`합니다.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 `disposing` 매개 변수는 `true`,이 메서드는 관리 개체가 보유 하는 모든 리소스를 해제 합니다.이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>참조.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 호출에서 `Dispose()` 각 참조 된 개체의 메서드.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 초기화를 종료 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to end the initialization of a component that is used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 다른 구성 요소에서 사용 되는 구성 요소 초기화를 끝냅니다 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>메서드 초기화를 시작 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>하 고 컨트롤을 완전히 초기화 되기 전에 사용 되지 않도록 하 EndInit 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 상태 표시줄 패널 내에 표시할 아이콘을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 또는 응용 프로그램 내에서 프로세스의 상태를 나타내는 아이콘을 표시 하려면이 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display an icon in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어에서 아이콘을 표시할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>지 여부를 나타내는 파일 저장 작업이 진행 중이거나 완료.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 내에서 아이콘을 독립적으로 위치를 지정할 방법이 있으면

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 아이콘의 왼쪽을 배치할 수 없습니다는 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>사용 하 여 오른쪽에 있는 텍스트를 맞추고는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: 아이콘은 항상 텍스트를 맞추는 방법을 상관 없이 패널의 텍스트의 왼쪽에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> that represents the icon to display in the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> 패널에 표시할 아이콘을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 상태 표시줄 패널의 너비를 허용 되는 최소값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The MinWidth property is used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> from automatically resizing to a width that is too small.
trans-unit.target: MinWidth 속성은 사용 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>방지 하기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>너무 작으면 너비 자동 조정.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, the MinWidth property is automatically set to the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, MinWidth 속성이 동일한 값으로 자동 설정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 최소 너비를 픽셀 단위로는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value less than 0 is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 0 보다 작은 값은 속성에 할당 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name to apply to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 적용할 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> 에</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 대 한 키에 해당 하는 Name 속성

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이름에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control that hosts the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> 상태 표시줄 패널을 호스트 하는 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is contained within.
trans-unit.target: 확인 하려면이 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>제어 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>내에 포함 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> 의 메서드</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> 를 호출 하 여 컨트롤</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> 에 추가 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>컨트롤을 통해 액세스할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> that contains the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> 패널을 포함 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 상태 표시줄 패널의 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to indicate whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하 여 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>텍스트 또는 소유자가 그린 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 패널 관리 되는지 여부를 표시</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 하는지 여부

trans-unit.source: To determine when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 시기를 결정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>요구 사항에 대 한 이벤트 처리기를 만들고, 그려야 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> passed as a parameter to an event handler of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>의 이벤트 처리기에 매개 변수로 전달 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>이벤트를 사용 하는 패널을 그려야 할 확인할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> also provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>또한 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>개체에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>했습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 그리기 작업을 수행 하는 데</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> 제공</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 속성에 할당 된 값의 구성원이 아닙니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref> 열거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 포함 하는 개체를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>에 대 한 데이터를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 상태 표시줄 패널의 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the text that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 텍스트를 나타냅니다. 선택할 때 표시 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display information about your application in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에 대 한 정보를 표시 하려면이 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Text property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 메뉴 위로 마우스를 이동할 때 도움말 정보를 표시 하거나 이름 및 응용 프로그램에서 열려 있는 파일의 위치를 표시 하도록 텍스트 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 텍스트를 정렬 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: 패널에 표시할 텍스트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 상태 표시줄 패널와 관련 된 도구 설명 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 에 마우스 포인터를 놓으면 도구 설명에 추가 정보를 표시 하려면이 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays the status of a file transfer.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어에 대 한 데이터 전송 속도 제공 하는 도구 설명을 표시할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>파일 전송의 상태를 표시 하는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램의 다른 컨트롤에 대 한 도구 설명을 표시할지를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the panel.
trans-unit.target: 패널에 대 한 도구 설명 텍스트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string that contains information about the panel.
trans-unit.target: 패널에 대 한 정보를 포함 하는 문자열을 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the class name for the control and the text it contains.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 및 포함 된 텍스트에 대 한 클래스 이름을 포함 하는 문자열을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 상태 표시줄 패널의 너비를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Width property always reflects the actual width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> and cannot be smaller than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Width 속성의 실제 너비를 항상 반영는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>보다 작을 수 없습니다 및는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To automatically resize the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 너비를 자동으로 조정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>의 내용에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>를 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 너비를 픽셀 단위로는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The width specified is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*> property.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 너비의 값 보다 작으면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>
